trans-unit.source:
The console module displays child pages as icons and links, or categories to assist in navigation. The console module has 4 different display modes:

  • small icons with details as tooltip (Small Icons, Simple View)
  • large icons details as tooltips (Large Icons, Simple View)
  • small icons list with details (Small Icons, Detailed View)
  • large icon list with details (Large Icons, Detailed View)

Page Settings the console module depends on:

Page NameThe Page Name is shown as the link title.
Page DescriptionThe Page Description is shown as the tooltip or detail.
DisabledCategory titles are shown if the page has 'Disabled' checked. Child pages of the disabled page will be shown under the title.
Icon FileThis icon is used in small icon views.
Large Icon FileThis icon is used in large icon views.
Tip: 'Include in menu' setting will hide pages from the menu but not the console.



Console Module Settings

Show children ofSelecting a page will display all child pages of that page. Leave this field blank to display all child pages for the current page.
Default icon sizeDetermines the icon size.
Allow icon resizeAllow the user to resize the icons.
Default viewDetermines the default view. Simple view will show icons with page descriptions as tooltips. Detailed view will show a list with descriptions for each item.
Allow view changeAllow the user to switch between detailed and simple views.
Show tooltipShow a tooltip with detailed description when hovering over icons in Simple View.
WidthLeave this field empty to allow the icons to expand horizontally or enter a pixel value to minimize the console width. E.g. Set this value to 400 for 2 columns of icons.
Tip: You can prevent users from changing the layout of the page by unchecking 'Allow Icon Resize' and 'Allow View Change'.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to allow users to resize the icons.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to allow users to resize the icons.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to allow users to switching between detailed and simple views.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to allow users to switching between detailed and simple views.

trans-unit.source: Determines the default view. Simple view will show icons with page descriptions as tooltips. Detailed view will show a list with descriptions for each item.
trans-unit.target: Determines the default view. Simple view will show icons with page descriptions as tooltips. Detailed view will show a list with descriptions for each item.

trans-unit.source: Selecting a page will display all child pages for that page. Leave this field blank to display all child pages for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Selecting a page will display all child pages for that page. Leave this field blank to display all child pages for the current page.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to display a detailed description when hovering over icons in Simple View.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to display a detailed description when hovering over icons in Simple View.

trans-unit.source: Leave blank to allow the icons to expand horizontally or enter a pixel value to minimize the width of the console. E.g. Enter set this value to 400 for 2 columns of icons.
trans-unit.target: Leave blank to allow the icons to expand horizontally or enter a pixel value to minimize the width of the console. E.g. Enter set this value to 400 for 2 columns of icons.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to include the parent page.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to include the parent page.

trans-unit.source: Select the mode of the module.
trans-unit.target: Select the mode of the module.

trans-unit.source: You can manage the visibility of individual pages.
trans-unit.target: You can manage the visibility of individual pages.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to reorder the page list to display parent pages and their child pages at the end of list. This allows parent and child pages to display in same area of the Console. Alternatively, uncheck this box to display all pages in alphabetical order.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to reorder the page list to display parent pages and their child pages at the end of list. This allows parent and child pages to display in same area of the Console. Alternatively, uncheck this box to display all pages in alphabetical order.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to include pages which are hidden in the menu.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to include pages which are hidden in the menu.
